00036 char* string_nextline(char* str, char* start, int len)
00037 {
00038         char* s = start;
00039         char* se = str + len;
00040         int crlffound = 0;
00041         while (s < se)
00042         {
00043                 if (*s == '\r' || *s == '\n')
00044                 {       // crlf
00045                         crlffound = 1;
00046                 } else {
00047                         if(crlffound)
00048                         {       // begin of new line found
00049                                 return (*s) ? s : NULL; // first character is '\0': end of buffer
00050                         }
00051                 }
00052                 s++;
00053         }
00054         return NULL;    // no new line found in buffer
00055 }

00065 char* string_get_i(char* str, int* i)
00066 {
00067         char* s;
00068         *i = (int )strtol(str, &s, 0);
00069         return (s == str) ? NULL : s;
00070 }

00072 
00080 char* string_get_ui(char* str, unsigned int* ui)
00081 {
00082         char* s;
00083         *ui = (unsigned int )strtoul(str, &s, 0);
00084         return (s == str) ? NULL : s;
00085 }

00095 char* string_get_d(char* str, double* d)
00096 {
00097         char* s;
00098         *d = strtod(str, &s);
00099         return (s == str) ? NULL : s;
00100 }

00110 char* string_get_f(char* str, float* f)
00111 {
00112         char* s;
00113         *f = (float )strtod(str, &s);   // strtof() only available in GNU-C
00114         return (s == str) ? NULL : s;
00115 }

00128 char* string_get_block(char* str, const char* fmt, int* idat, float* fdat, double *ddat)
00129 {
00130         char* strend;
00131         int index_i, index_f;
00132         if ((str = strchr(str, '[')) == NULL)
00133         {       // search begin of block
00134                 return NULL;
00135         }
00136         if ((strend = strchr(str, ']')) == NULL)
00137         {    // search end of block
00138                 return NULL;
00139         }
00140         str++;                               // remove delimiters
00141         *strend = '\0';
00142         index_i = index_f = 0;
00143         while(*fmt)
00144         {
00145                 switch(*fmt++)
00146                 {
00147                         case 'i':
00148                                 if((str = string_get_i(str, &idat[index_i++])) == NULL)
00149                                 {
00150                                         *strend = ']';
00151                                         return NULL;
00152                                 }
00153                                 break;
00154                         case 'f':
00155                                 if((str = string_get_f(str, &fdat[index_f++])) == NULL)
00156                                 {
00157                                         *strend = ']';
00158                                         return NULL;
00159                                 }
00160                                 break;
00161                         case 'd':
00162                                 if((str = string_get_d(str, &ddat[index_f++])) == NULL)
00163                                 {
00164                                         *strend = ']';
00165                                         return NULL;
00166                                 }
00167                                 break;
00168                         default:        // unknown format character
00169                                 *strend = ']';
00170                                 return NULL;
00171                 }
00172         }
00173         // ignore additional data inside the block
00174         *strend = ']';
00175         return strend + 1;
00176 }

00178 
00186 char* string_get_word(char* str, std::string& w)
00187 {
00188         char* strend;
00189         while (*str == ' ')
00190         {       // search begin of 'word'
00191                 str++;
00192         }
00193         if (!(strend = strchr(str, ' ')))
00194         {       // search end of 'word'
00195                 w.assign(str);
00196                 strend = str;
00197                 while (*strend != '\0')
00198                 {       // search end of 'word'
00199                         strend++;
00200                 }
00201                 return (strend == str) ? NULL : strend;
00202         }
00203         w.assign(str, (int )(strend - str));
00204         return strend;
00205 }
00206 
00207 
00215 char* string_get_quoted_text(char* str, std::string& qt)
00216 {
00217         char* strend;
00218         if (!(str = strchr(str, '\"')))
00219         {       // search begin of 'quoted text'
00220                 return NULL;
00221         }
00222         str++;
00223         if (!(strend = strchr(str, '\"')))
00224         {       // search end of 'quoted text'
00225                 return NULL;
00226         }
00227         qt.assign(str, (int )(strend - str));
00228         return strend + 1;
00229 }

00231 
00239 char* string_cmp_parameter(char* str, const char* p)
00240 {
00241         bool lastwasdigit = false;
00242         while(*p)
00243         {
00244                 if (!lastwasdigit)
00245                 {       // skip leading zeros
00246                         while(*p == '0')
00247                         {
00248                                 p++;
00249                         }
00250                         while(*str == '0')
00251                         {
00252                                 str++;
00253                         }
00254                 }
00255                 if (*str != *p)
00256                 {       // compare next character
00257                         return NULL;
00258                 }
00259                 if (*p == ' ')
00260                 {       // skip white space
00261                         do {
00262                                 p++;
00263                         } while (*p == ' ');
00264 
00265                         do {
00266                                 str++;
00267                         } while (*str == ' ');
00268 
00269                         lastwasdigit = false;
00270                         continue;
00271                 }
00272                 lastwasdigit = (*p >= '0' && *p <= '9');
00273                 str++;
00274                 p++;
00275         }
00276         do {  // skip white space
00277                 str++;
00278         } while (*str == ' ');
00279         return str;
00280 }
